long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shares the current web page in a new Codicent message.

This extension requires a Codicent account, which can be applied for/registered at https://codicent.com.

Codicent is a web and app based service the lets users log, presist, access and trigger automatic actions based on a project chat interface similiar to Twitter.

This browser extension is one piece of the Codicent service. Other parts are the mobile app (a PWA), the web site, a python library and the command line interface (CLI). Codicent runs on Android, iOS, Linux, MacOS and Windows.
